data.text: @MichaelSocolow It is hard for him to filter through when he is so soft-spoken. 😀When he hosted Millionaire, he wore a shirt and tie of the same color and Van Heusen started a Regis Philbin collection. We called that look “The Regis” for many years after.
@MichaelSocolow Even this side of the Atlantic Regis would be identified by many in a picture line up if nothing else from his bloopers outtakes on YouTube

@IBHallofFame You know, I'm not sure what I tweeted was accurate- Thanks for the reply. So many great Irish broadcasters (Morton Downey (Sr.!), Regis Philbin, Graham McNamee) in U.S. media history. I'm going to ask my students this fall if they've heard of Regis Philbin & will report back.
@MichaelSocolow I believe he has logged more hours on television than anyone in history.
@MichaelSocolow I would watch him with my mom when I was home sick from school.
@MichaelSocolow I love that you tweeted an article from 1999.
